title: Werebat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During a Full Moon, Shroud a player
- During a New Moon, learn what happens to a player

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have Detection Immunity, but only during non-Full Moon Nights.
- You have a night chat with other Weres
- Shrouding another player will prevent them from reciveing end-of-night notifications, excluding death messages.
- Investigation results are shared with other Weres.
- You cannot target other Weres

fields.name: Hunting Moon Enchancement:
fields.value:
**Night Overhang**
Learn who your target visits as well as shrouding them.
